name: small-theme
description: Booqable theme with comprehensive build system

scripts.build:js: npm run minify:js && npm run copy:js:utils
scripts.build:liquid: npm run copy:config && npm run copy:layout && npm run copy:sections && npm run copy:snippets && npm run copy:templates
scripts.build: npm run build:scss && npm run build:js && npm run build:images && npm run build:svg && npm run build:liquid
scripts.watch:liquid: npm run watch:config & npm run watch:layout & npm run watch:sections & npm run watch:snippets & npm run watch:templates
scripts.watch: npm run watch:scss & npm run watch:js & npm run watch:images & npm run watch:svg & npm run watch:liquid
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run watch
scripts.clean: rm -rf assets/* config/* layout/* sections/* snippets/* templates/*
scripts.clean:selective: npm run build:liquid && npm run build:js && npm run build:images && npm run build:scss
scripts.lint: npm run lint:scss && npm run lint:js
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:scss -- --fix && npm run lint:js -- --fix
